::GoldenEye::

She frowned. "I never hide. I thought you were a Maximal or something.
I was going to attack.  But no Maximal would dare be as bold and 
brave as you Mosquitor." She smiled and hoped that the flattery would 
disarm the bot.
"But I must tell you," she whispered," There are some maximals over 
there" she pointed away from the lake. "I saw them going that way. 
That's why  thought you were a Maximal. IF you hurry, you could still 
catch them and kill them before they know it."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Mosquitor::
> 
> Mosquitor relaxes as he hears that the bot was a Predacon. He peers 
into the 
> bushes, trying to see exactly where the bot was.
> 
> "My name is Mosquitor, soldier of the leadership!" he replies to 
her 
> question, and then becomes curious, "Why are you hiding?"
